PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_DistanceExpression
PropertySetDef.Definition: Specifies a station equation using incoming and outgoing stations and incoming and outgoing labels for _IfcReferent_.

PropertyDef.Name: IncomingStation
PropertyDef.Definition: The station value of the incoming segment that ends at this location.

PropertyDef.Name: OutgoingStation
PropertyDef.Definition: The station value of the outgoing segment that starts at this location. If omitted, OutgoingStation value is equal to IncomingStation value.

PropertyDef.Name: IncomingLabel
PropertyDef.Definition: The label referencing the incoming segment that ends at this location.

PropertyDef.Name: OutgoingLabel
PropertyDef.Definition: The label of the outgoing segment that starts at this location. If omitted, OutgoingLabel value is equal to the IncomingLabel value.
